node.display_long_description:
Now with Quest 2 enhancements! 

Jump into a nitro fuelled world where little cars mean BIG fun! Spanning across reclaimed ruins and scorched outbacks through to rain soaked docks and sun-kissed tropical islands - Mini Motor Racing X will take you on a micro driving journey across the globe like no other.

FEATURES:

QUEST 2 ENHANCEMENTS: Stunning new water & reflections with higher render resolutions than ever before

HUGE CAREERS: Collect dozens of cars and race on over 50 tracks in hundreds of races with vibrant, rich visuals, day and night and in varying weather conditions. 

PARTY MODES: Play with your friends in a selection of wild party games including Bumper Ball, Drop Zone, Battle Area and more!

UPGRADE YOUR RIDES: Pump your hard earned winnings into upgrades to help give you the edge.

MULTIPLAYER: Full online multiplayer with up to 4 friends and campaign co-op.

MULTIPLE WAYS TO PLAY: Play from in-car, top-down, track-side or anywhere else that takes your fancy!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
* Fixed night versions of tracks missing their unique music (Not all night tracks have unique music).

* Fixed an issue that could cause a lap to not count on the Suburbia track.

nodes.title: MULTIPLAYER MADNESS: PARTY PACK UPDATE NOW LIVE!
nodes.body_text:
Whether you want to sit behind the wheel for some intense driving action or take in the spectacle from above, the tiny cars of Mini Motor Racing X pack a sizable fun-filled punch with four all-new party games that take the multiplayer mayhem to a new level.

In Bombs Away, all players start in the center of the arena. A random player starts with the bomb, which brings with it enhanced speed. The player with the bomb can ram another player to pass the bomb onto them. Whoever has the bomb when the fuse runs down (and explodes) loses one health pip, and they start with a fresh bomb. Last one standing wins.



In King of the Road, all players once again start in the center of the arena, with a random player donning the crown—which earns you points while wearing it. Players must try to ram the crown holder to get the crown for themselves. Whoever has the most points when the time limit runs out wins.



Each player in Battle Arena starts with three health pips, and cars start spread out across the arena. Players pick up random weapons or items and attempt to attack the other players while avoiding their attacks. Last one standing wins.



Drop Zone mixes things up, with players starting spaced out around a floating platform. Players aim to knock each other off the edge of the platform—which shrinks over time, increasing the danger. Last one standing wins.



Ready to put the pedal to the metal and see how your racing skills stack up against the competition? Check out Mini Motor Racing X and the free Party Pack Update available now!

node.reviewDescription:
This game is a love letter to fans of games like RC Pro Am. Vibrant, cartoony, colourful graphics with solid racing mechanics. Fun as an RC racer, as a first person racer and as a competitive combat race. 

Only thing I would change is the ease of camera switching. Even with double click set, the game often changes from first person to a distant overhead perspective. Very disorienting. Certainly user error on my part but it happens frequently.

Spanning across reclaimed ruins and scorched outbacks through to rain soaked docks and sun-kissed tropical islands - Mini Motor Racing X will take you on a micro driving journey across the globe like no other.
